name: Particle Trail Game
description:
I was inspired by Frank's Laboratory on Youtube. This is a game that uses his constellation trails code.  I added a music playlist from youtube and some rudimentary scoring. I hope you like it. It is a bit like very pretty, very easy, tidying up.

Here is a link to the code on Codepen https://codepen.io/portree-maths-tutor/pen/dyZYKQp
